body:
Comment 1: 
On a hunch that runtime.sysctl was incorrect I bodged runtime.getncpus() and got a
little further.

[pi@raspberry-pi ~/go/src]$ truss  $(find ../ -name 'go_bootstrap')
-- UNKNOWN SYSCALL 5242880 --
(null)(0x30102000,0x0,0x1002,0xffffffff,0x8a0ec) ERR#78 'Function not implemented'
SIGNAL 12 (SIGSYS)
process exit, rval = 0
